Good Comments: They're one of the few fansub groups still subbing the latest episodes, and also release revised versions later to correct spelling and whatnot.
Incorrect translation and also doesn't translate the names of the minor characters introduced in each episode.
They make up words from their own. Remove honorifics. Americanize the show way too much (but less than CR, OC)
Hadena-tier grammar and seemingly Hadena-tier translations too. This hurt to watch.
Bad Comments: The translation is far from accurate in so many different instances. The hard work is appreciated but making up stuff to release fast is definitely NOT
They teamed up with Hubuki, not often you see that kind of teamwork between fansubs.
Very inconsistent. Some episodes have spelling and grammar mistakes all over them. Also doesn't sub the next episode previews.
